reference.title: serviced log export
reference.shortdesc: The serviced log export command exports application log files from Logstash for one or more services based on service identifier or service name. By default, the command exports a tar archive file, which contains a separate log file for each unique combination of container and log file name, and an index file summarizing the log files.

dlentry.dd: The start date, in yyyy.mm.dd format. The default is yesterday's date.
The end date, in yyyy.mm.dd format. The default is today's date.
The name or ID of one or more services. By default, all child services are included.
The path or paths of one or more application logs to export.
The location for the output file.
Group the results. The value of Group can be container, service, or day.

section.title: EXAMPLE
section.codeblock: serviced log export --service zope --service zenhub --group-by day \ --from 2017.05.01 --to 2017.05.31 --out /tmp
